name: Amna Amir
description:
Hey there! My name is Amna, and I'm currently pursuing my bachelor's degree in Computer Science. I am a passionate student who loves coding and constantly learning new things in the world of technology.I find immense joy in solving problems, creating solutions, and continually expanding my knowledge.
One of my favorite shers that inspires me and reflects my life motto is:
quote:
چاند کی طرف پرواز کرو
اگر تم چاند تک نہ پہنچ سکے تو
ستاروں کو ضرور چھو لو گے

projects.title: Ludo Game
projects.description: A 6 player ludo game developed in C++ and SFML. This game accommodates 2, 4, and 6 players including all traditional features of Ludo and various other functionalities. Using SFML library to create a visually appealing and interactive gaming interface.

projects.title: Paint App
projects.description: Paint app developed in Python using Tkinter library, similar to Microsoft Paint.

projects.title: Mini Excel Sheets
projects.description: An excel sheet developed in C and SFML that uses orthogonal linked lists (having pointers in 4 directions). It has various Excel-like functionalities such as range avg, min, max, sum, and allows adding or deleting rows, columns, or cells.

projects.title: Chess Game
projects.description: A Chess game developed in C and SFML showcasing every chess functionality and time barrier for each player.

projects.title: Solitaire Game
projects.description: A solitaire game developed in C++ with visually appealing animations and advanced features for different difficulty levels.

projects.title: Sports Arena Booking Site
projects.description: A MERN stack web app to book a sports arena for a specific sport in your city. Arena owners can post arenas for users to book and organize tournaments in which users can participate.

title: Portfolio

meta.description: Hey, I'm Amna! A passionate Computer Science student with a love for coding, technology, and innovation. Explore my projects and skills in C++, JavaScript, Python, HTML, and more.
meta.keywords: Amna Amir, Computer Science, ITU, Pakistan, coding, web development, C++, JavaScript, Python, HTML, student portfolio, technology, software development, projects
meta.author: Amna Amir
